resources.string: Dashboard service registration failed with error code %1$d!
Dashboard service unregistration failed with error code %1$d!
No WLAN IP address found! Is WLAN on and associated?

Geo Dashboard has been developed by Matthias Grünewald. He owns the copyright for the application, this help and all the media used.
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. Please contact the author if you want to use Geo Dashboard for commercial purposes.
This app uses the JmDNS library for network service discovery. The project was originally developed by Arthur van Hoff under the GNU Lesser General Public License as jRendevous. It was moved to Sourceforge by Rick Blair and renamed to JmDNS with the Arthur's kind permission. Currently it has been re-released under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
The dog icon has been designed by Nathan Hwang. It is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license.
The car icon has been designed by Google Inc. It is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.
The ship icon is from the AIGA symbol signs collection which was produced through a collaboration between AIGA and the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT) in 1974 and 1979. All images in the collection are public domain.
